SimplexMethod
Class SimplexModel

java.lang.Object
  SimplexMethod.SimplexMethod
      SimplexMethod.SimplexModel

public class SimplexModel
extends SimplexMethod

Author:
Scott Palmer
Descripiton:
This is the model for the simplex method. It holds the information from the view and performs the chosen method for the simplex method.

getPhase

public int getPhase()
Returns the integer value the current phase. 0: Second Phase with no artifical variables introduced. 1: First Phase with artifical variables introduced. 2: Second Phase with artifical variables removed.

Returns:
The integer value of the current phase.

methodFastestDecent

public int[] methodFastestDecent(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> possPivotVar)
From a list of possible pivot variables the lowest possible function is found to produce the fastest pivot to reach theorem 1 constraints.

Parameters:
possPivotVar - An ArrayList of possible variable to enter the basis and pivot about.
Returns:
An array of integers where the first reference is the function and the second is the variable to pivot on.
